caption.p: Effects of olaparib on influenza virus challenge-induced mortality in mice. (a) Chemical structure of olaparib. (b) Mice from each experimental group were treated for 2 days before viral challenge and 6 days after infection and survival for 15 consecutive days. Oseltamivir was used as positive control. Ola, olaparib group; IAV, influenza A virus-infected group. n = 20 in each group. * p < 0.05, ** p < 0.01, and *** p < 0.001 compared with the IAV infection group
